name: Clean city
description:
Install instructions

--WINDOWS--

Unzip the file "Clean City - Windows.zip" and launch the game "Clean City - Windows\Clean City.exe".

--LINUX--

Unzip the file "Clean City - Linux.zip" and launch the game "Clean City - Linux\Clean City.x86_64".

--MAC--

Unzip the file "Clean City - Mac.app.zip" and launch the game in "Clean City - Mac.app\Contents\MacOS\Clean City".

--Android--

Install the .apk file and launch the game.
